::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz14_shp <- st_read(dsn = "data/", layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz14_kml <- st_write(mpsz14_shp, "data/MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL.kml", delete_dsn = TRUE)
```

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata <- read.csv("data/respopagesextod2023.csv")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata2023 <- popdata %>% 
  group_by(PA, SZ, AG) %>%
  summarise(`POP` = sum(`Pop`)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = AG, values_from = POP)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'PA', 'SZ'. You can override using the
`.groups` argument.
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
colnames(popdata2023)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1] "PA"          "SZ"          "0_to_4"      "10_to_14"    "15_to_19"   
 [6] "20_to_24"    "25_to_29"    "30_to_34"    "35_to_39"    "40_to_44"   
[11] "45_to_49"    "50_to_54"    "55_to_59"    "5_to_9"      "60_to_64"   
[16] "65_to_69"    "70_to_74"    "75_to_79"    "80_to_84"    "85_to_89"   
[21] "90_and_Over"
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata2023 <- popdata2023 %>%
  mutate_at(.vars = vars(PA, SZ),
            .funs = list(toupper))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pop2023_mpsz <- left_join(popdata2023, mpsz19_shp, by = c("SZ" = "SUBZONE_N"))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz_pop2023 <- left_join(mpsz19_shp, popdata2023, by = c("SUBZONE_N" = "SZ"))
```
:::
